metadata.title: The Crimson Whale Meets the Monster Fish

tracks.text: Sunraku's muscular body, covered in the scars of Lycagon's mark, walks across an expanse under the night sky and nearly full moon.
Debris floats
Backdropped by lightning, text reads, Shangri-La Frontier
Ink sketch of Sunraku's face. The ink splatters, and Emul falls through it. Sunraku catches her, and she crawls onto his shoulder. Behind him is a picture of Rakuro
Pencilgon smiles at us. Behind her is a picture of Towa Amane.
Katzo's hands burn with fire. Behind her is Kei Uomi.
Psyger strikes the grown with the purple long sword Antinomy.
A nest of interlocking lines forms. Ceecrue, a white rabbit samurai, leaps across them.
Outstretched hands form a diamond. Akitsu Akane's face smiles in the gap.
Rust holds a bow and Mold holds a staff.
Chains wrap around Sunraku's legs
Rakuro reaches up a hand. A hand reaches towards the metal spine in the ruins of past glories.
Psyger-0, Sunraku, Katzo, and Pencilgon stand side by side.
The chains shatter.
In red, fishmen wield swords and race towards the party in a circle.
The fishmen charge Stude at the wheel of the ship.
A mermaid fights a shark.
Giant octopus arms wrap around a tattered ship
A girl with blue eyes and white hair dances. Star Rain, Sylvia Goldberg. She falls into the floor, the floor rotates, and a white super hero replaces her. Galaxia Series, The Meteus
A brown haired girl turns into a tree girl. Nitro Squad.
In front of her stands an old man samurai and a young man with gauntlets.
A whale swims, its face engulfed with fire. It approaches an expanse with floating debris. Sunraku walks.
Lightning crackles across the whale. It opens its mouth. Darkness.
He sees Psyger-0 in a barrel.
Text, 43, The Crimson Whale Meets the Monster Fish
Light shines over the horizon. Seagulls fly over embarking ships.
Dialog, Unique Scenario, Find the Abyss's Disciples. Begin now?
She presses Yes
Brawny men run towards her, carrying a barrel.
2 men pick of Akane and Ceecrue, and toss them in the air. Another man catches them in the barrel.
Rust sighs
Psyger stares
Before pressing the button to leave the party, the join unique scenario dialog pops up. She joins.
Psyger-0 stares at her sister.
She pumps her fist. The others stare.
He turns to look at the ocean.
Crew push away the gang way.
They raise the anchor.
Crew pull on ropes. The sails unfurl.
The Scarlet Whale embarks.
Rust and Mold look at a ballista.
Seagulls fly over head. Akane and Ceecrue wave.
Stude sweats, eyeing Sunraku's scars.
The Scarlet Whale cuts through calm seas.
A crewman stands in the crow's nest.
He looks through a spy glass.
He sees a dark cloud forming
A fishing line pulls taut. Sunraku and Psyger fish
He looks to the side and grips the pole tightly.
The dark cloud grows larger and larger, filling the sky above the ship.
The sea around the ship turns dark.
Wind ripples against the sails. The seagulls fly away.
Lightning crackles then shoots down, striking the ocean nearby.
Lightning swirls around the section of water. A bubble starts to rise from the sea.
The bubble pops, revealing a dark mast with a tattered sail. The shock sends waves across the water, rocking the ship.
Sunraku stumbles and grabs on to Psyger. She blushes.
The Crying Innsman is a black, rotting ship with 3 masts and tattered sails.
The Scarlet Whale and the Crying Innsman face each other on the dark ocean.
Psyger is still blushing.
The crewman runs to a Ballista
He runs to the wheel
Sunraku stares up at the boy, who looks forward.
Stude glances at Sunraku, and they make eye contact. Sunraku softens.
Sunraku grabs rope.
He ties himself to the ship.
A crewman holds a mast. Rust and Mold grab railings. Akane and Ceecrue brace against a wall.
Psyger holds a beam and ropes.
The sterns make contact. The Scarlet Whale pierces through the Crying Innsman.
Crew go flying.
Akane and Ceecrue hold onto railings.
Fish people with swords descend on the ship.
The fishmen land on the deck
A crewman stands between Stude and the fishmen, holding a sword.
A fishman lunges.
An arrow hits the fishman. He slides across the deck, then dissipates.
Rust stands at a ballista.
She loads an arrow. A fishman flies at Stude.
She fires, sending the fishman flying
Across the deck, crew and the party fight fishmen. Psyger strikes one across the chest. It stumbles back.
Akane strikes a fishman, who steps back.
The deck rocks. The fishman swings.
Ceecrue cuts the fishman in half. It dissipates.
Sunraku cuts one in half.
He runs forward and up the stairs. Standing on the fo'c'sle, the forward upper deck, he sees fishmen coming from the Innsman.
Mold hops the railing, holding a staff. Rust holds a purple arrow with runic inscriptions.
He holds out his staff, and a purple diamond with decorations flashes in front of him, then in front of Rust's fire arrow.
She fires. The arrow and diamond hit the hoard of fishmen, and they fly back into the ocean.
He leaps up. The fishmen look up.
He lands on the dark, rotting deck of the Innsman.
A fishman swings. Sunraku parries, then pokes the fishman twice with the purple blade, and the chest rots away.
The magic strikes the fishman, sending it flying. It dissipates in mid-air.
A group of fishmen emerge from inside the boat.
In the darkness, a shackled hand clutches chains.
A fishman swings, Sunraku dodges.
Flashback, drawing Arcanum, The Fool, Time between skill uses is halved
2 fishmen leap
Sunraku turns. A fire arrow strikes both fishmen at once
Rust on deck, Mold in crow's nest
Scars
The zombie fishmen shuffle forward
An anchor flies through the air.
Rust and Sunraku dodge. The anchor lands in the deck.
Inverted text, FrillShark Zombie, Denizen of the Abyss
Stude picks up a sword. Lightning crackles in the storm.
Psyger swings. A fishman stumbles back, then swings. She blocks.
Akane and Ceecrue kill the fishman.
She opens her equipment list. On the Innsman, Sunraku and Rust stare at the FrillShark
He grabs Emul
He throws Emul
Emul's eyes spin in spirals
Ducsuram in hand, Sunraku charges the FrillShark. Rust strings a magic fire arrow.
Pixel art title card. Blue text over a starry background spell Shangri-La Frontier
Sunraku holds Ducsuram and stands in an underwater town.
Pencilgon holds a golden spear and stands in the hidden garden
Katzo holds up fists and stands by the Teardrop lake
Psyger crosses her arms and stands in the Lightless Barrens
Montage of the game store, the Utopia headquarters, the palace, Rabbituza, a tower, and Fifticia.
Sunraku runs across an underwater town. Fish swim in the air. Seaweed lines the street.
Katzo runs across the cave floor on the shores of the Teardrop lake
A serpent emerges from the lake. Crab pincers snap.
Montage of items. Log. Bow. Twin blue blades. Grimoire. Mana potion. Cards.
Pencilgon runs across the hidden garden. Red spider lilies blow in the breeze, surrounded by cavernous walls, under a full moon.
Ceecrue, Rust, Sunraku, Akane, Mold, and Psyger walk along a dock. A crescent moon shines over the sea.
The Scarlet Whale floats at sea. A giant octopus leg reaches up.
Rakuro, Towa, Kei, and a brown haired woman walk along an urban street. Cars drive by.
Montage. The Sage of Awakening. Akane's fox mask. A person in a yellow demon mask. An old man samurai. The beetle helm. A gas mask.
Blue text over a black background spells Shangri-La Frontier
